CatDescriptText: Cutline of related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 18, 1962, pg. 1 reads: "All-Night Gospel Sing For Drafts Fund-The Buggsy Drafts fund has passed the $1,000 mark. Credit radio broadcaster Bill Powell and his "All Night Gospel Singing Program" with providing the impetus to pass the first crucial milestone in Courier's quest for $5,000."
TitMainTitle: Congregation of men, and women, including one standing in aisle, in Calvary Baptist Church for All Nigh Gospel Sing for the Charles "Buggsy" Drafts Fund
